New Interislander ferries: Majority of Kiwis want rail-enabled boats across Cook Strait - Horizons Research poll https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-interislander-ferries-majority-of-kiwis-want-rail-enabled-boats-across-cook-strait-horizo​​ns-research-poll/PQLI7WN74RB3LEXQJX7IE5Y6TU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/new-interislander-ferries-majority-of-kiwis-want-rail-enabled-boats-across-cook-strait-horizo​​ns-research-poll/PQLI7WN74RB3LEXQJX7IE5Y6TU/ Raphael FranksSome transport sector leaders say ferries non-rail-enabled would make freight more costly.
